title: Meditation by Aroma Retail
description: Raise your inner awareness and open your mind with enlightening top notes of Bergamot, Ginger, Cardamom, and Coconut; smoothed out with mid notes of Blue Iris, Lavender, Violet, Leaves, and Cedar; and base notes of Sandalwood, Balsam, Amber, and Cashmere Musk. This is the best scent for meditating and deep thinking. To Mix and Match glassware, click here

This is the best scent for meditating and deep thinking.
